string.value: #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says she's being pestered by #rRibbon Pigs#k. Let's talk to her.

#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says the #rRibbon Pigs#k are too loud and requests that you eliminate the #rRibbon Pigs#k.
She says you can easily find them in #b#m100030000##k.

Report back to #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k upon completion.
Let's take the Antique to #b#@9201118:##k in #bHenesys#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2,000 #Wbasic# #i4001353:# #t4001353:# #c4001353# 1 Able to proceed to 'The Cost of Delivery' as next quest.

Dear beginning Bowman!
The #rRibbon Pigs#k in #bNautilus#k are causing a ruckus here. I can't even load and unload my luggage without having to worry about the luggage getting damaged because of the Pigs.

Won't you hunt some of those #rRibbon Pigs#k for me?

This will help you become much stronger.

You'll find a lot of #rRibbon Pigs#k in #b#m100030000##k. Please hunt 30 of them.

I'll give you the #rAntique#k you want if you do that for me.
That was fast. That wasn't too hard now, was it?\n\nYou've probably become much stronger than #rRibbon Pigs#k. I'll give you the #rAntique#k as promised.

It's much more quiet and peaceful around here now. The crewmen are enjoying their work more now.
And I hope this benefitted you as well, since you're training and all.

Take this #rAntique#k over to #b#p9201118##k in #bHenesys#k. It really isn't a very practical item, so don't steal it or anything. Make sure you deliver it! Tee hee.
